events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to return the product because it doesn't meet my expectations.
The issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for a return.
Support agent assigned to handle the refund request and assist the customer with the return process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to return the product. I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you wish to return the item to proceed with your request?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product was fine, but it isn't exactly what I expected.
We can certainly process a full refund for your order once the item is returned. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thank you, that sounds great. I appreciate the quick response and help.
The return label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the product, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm if you have managed to return the product and if the refund process is clear to you.
Yes, I shipped the item yesterday. Thank you again for the assistance.
We have received your return and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account in 3-5 business days.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to gather feedback about your recent experience with our returns process.
The customer completed the survey and expressed satisfaction with the handling and resolution of their refund request.
The support case has been formally closed following the successful refund and positive customer feedback.
